name: Plentiful Apples
description:
It's Apple Buck Season and Apple Bloom has decided to check in on her siblings to see if she can help out but fate has other plans for her.

How to play:
You play as Apple Bloom, the youngest of three siblings, who doesn't have much in the way of responsibilities so finds the time to explore but for once she has decided to try help out, with their quick hooves and bouncy jumping she's more than capable of collecting Apples, the key the finding all three different endings.

Controls:
> W or Up arrow key to interact
> A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to move
> Space bar to jump and progress interactions

> Apples Everywhere: Foxknight01's Fan Remake:
Info:
Way back when My Little Pony creepypasta styled games were more common there was a pretty neat series called Flutter Island, while the first and second games weren't too special they had a prequel that tried to set up a story that aspect alone made me interested in making a fan remake of it back when I went under the username Foxknight01, sadly the original Flutter Island series seems to be gone or just hard to come by with only remakes and old videos to act as reminders of their existence, however unlike them I still have my fan remake from all those years ago just with a different file name to make it less confusing.

Warning:
Typical of My Little Pony creepypasta styled games from years ago this fan remake has obnoxious jumpscares and refuses to be minimized and ALT+F4'd so it is heavily advised that you set your task manager to be above all windows so you can force the game to close.

Heads up:
If you don't have it already Windows will most likely request you to install "Direct Play", I am unsure of what it does but it seems to not matter regardless of if you have it.

Controls:
> W key to jump
> A/D keys to move
> Space bar to progress interactions
